content.body: foolip: is there some way to get a higher priority on https://github.com/web-platform-tests/wpt/issues/27868? Not being able to add new HTML elements seems kinda bad. Or perhaps we should ask zcorpan if he wants to perform the import dance once more...

content.body: annevk: foolip : I will fix it by upstreaming mozilla's html5lib-test runner to wpt and then move the test data to wpt
